paragraphs: =ahora=, _adv._, now, at present; =-- mismo=, in this very minute. =123=, 7; =por --=, for the present, for the time being, =77=, 1.
=ahorcar=, _v. a._, to hang; to hang up, =15=, 10.
=ahorrar=, _v. a._, =ahorrarse=, _v. refl._, to save, to save up, to hoard, =11=, 21.
=ajeno, na=, _adj._, another's; of, belonging to another.
=ala=, _f._, wing; =tener alas=, to have freedom, license, assurance, standing, =117=, 10.
=alargar=, _v. a._, to pass, to hand; to bring; to hold out, to extend.
=albarca=, _f._, (_more usual form_ =abarca=), _a rough sort of_ shoe _or_ sandal; _see note to_ =95=, 17.
=alcalde=, _m._, mayor; =-- de monterilla=, _see_ =monterilla=, _and note to tit._ XVII.
=alcaldesa=, _f._, mayoress, mayor's wife, wife of alcalde, =89=, 26.
=alcanzar=, _v. a._, to reach, to attain; to extend, to succeed, to reach, =73=, 22; to overtake.
=aldaba=, _f._, handle; knocker, =47=, 20; =tener buenas aldabas=, =36=, 20, to have a good "pull."
=alegrar=, _v. a._, to rejoice, to make glad, to give pleasure to, =13=, 21; =--se=, _v. refl._, to be glad, to be pleased, =31=, 11; to rejoice, to be glad, =116=, 11. [p. 161]
=alegría=, _f._, joy, joyousness, cheerfulness; informality, openness, gayness, =19=, 8.
=algo=, _neuter_, something, somewhat, a little; =para --=, =85=, 19, not for nothing.
=alguno, na=, _pron. adj._, (=algún=), some, some or other; =-- que otro=, one or another, occasionally one, =40=, 9; =algunas veces=, sometimes, =10=, 6; =... --=, any whatever, =56=, 19.
=almorzar=, _v. a._, =8=, 5, to breakfast on, to eat for breakfast.
=alto, ta=, =adj.=, high, tall; =77=, 19, deep; =125=, 5, high, exalted; =en alta voz=, =58=, 21, aloud; =en --=, =84=, 7, aloft; =lo --=, _neuter_, the top, =16=, 7, =25=, 13.
=alumbrar=, _v. a._, to light, to illuminate, to show a light, =45=, 18, =55=, 30, =64=, 18.
=allá=, _adv._, there, thither, yonder; =¡-- ellos!= =29=, 5, that's their business.
=amansarse=, _v. refl._, to become mild, to grow mild, to grow gentle; to be pacified, =49=, 18. [p. 162]
=amenizar=, _v. a._, to adorn, to make charming, =14=, 29.
=amor=, _m._, love; =al -- de la lumbre=, =11=, 7, in the glow of the fire.
=ancho, cha=, adj., wide, broad; =a sus anchas=, =13=, 5, at their ease, at their leisure.
=andadas=, _f. pl._, traces, tracks of game; _see note to_ =9=, 10.
=andar=, _v. n._, to go to walk; to be; _part._, =andando=, =97=, 4, on foot; =vamos andando=, =89=, 18, let's be getting along, let's be making haste.
=Ánimas=, _fpl._, the tolling of a bell, to announce prayers for souls in purgatory; usually shortly after sunset. _See note to_ =8=, 14.
=ansiar=, _v. a._, to long for, to desire, =34=, 13.
=antes=, _adv._, before, beforehand; sooner, the sooner, =47=, 5; rather.
=anticipación=, _f._, anticipation; =habían llegado con bastante --=, =45=, 4, had arrived considerably ahead, before.
=anticuado, da=, _adj._, antiquated, grown old; =25=, 3, discarded; =91=, 24, former, old-time.
=antojarse=, _v. refl._, _used only in the third person_, to wish, to be pleasing; =como se te antoje=, =36=, 30, as you will, any way you please.
=año=, _m._, year; =al --=, =11=, 21, by the year, in the course of the year; =tener cuarenta --s=, to be forty years old.
=apagar=, _v. a._, to extinguish, to put out.
=aparecer=, _v. n._, to appear, to show oneself.
=aparejar=, _v. a._, to prepare, to get ready; to saddle, =57=, 17, =65=, 11.
=apartar=, _v. a._, to put aside, to push aside, push away, =109=, 14; _pp._ =apartada=, =99=, 14, standing aside, apart; =--se=, _v. refl._, to go aside, turn aside, turn from, =67=, 26.
=apearse=, _v. refl._, to dismount, to get down, =67=, 9.
=apoderarse=, _v. refl._, to gain possession, to get into one's power (=de=).
=apresurarse=, _v. refl._, to hasten, to make haste, =39=, 1.
=aprovechar=, _v. a._, to take advantage of, to make use of, to turn to account, to profit by, =41=, 5, _etc._ [p. 164]
=apuntar=, _v. a._, to aim at, to cover.
=aquí=, _adv._, here; =por --=, =34=, 6, here, hereabouts; =por --=, =47=, 4, =64=, 20, this way, in this direction; _cf._ =tomar=.
=Archena=, _f._, Archena (_town of Spain, on the Segura, 16 miles N. W. of Murcia_).
=armarse=, _v. refl._, to break out, to begin, =99=, 7, =126=, 9.
=arqueado, da=, _adj._, bent, bowed; =piernas arqueadas=, =25=, 23, bow-legs, bandy-legs.
=¡arre!= _interj._, get up! (_call used to draught animals_) _tit._ IX.
=arrear=, _v. a._, (_cf._ =arre=) to drive, to urge (_horses, etc._), =60=, 4, =82=, 15.
=arremangar=, _v. a._, to pull up the sleeves; _pp._ =arremangado=, _with_ =brazo=, =15=, 28, uncovered, bare, short-sleeved.
=arriba=, _adv._, above, upward; =piso de --=, =77=, 9, upper story; =de --abajo=, =80=, 7, up and down.
=arrimar=, _v. a._, to lean; =le arrimó una bofetada=, =119=, 10, dealt him a blow; _pp._ arrimado, =118=, 11, leaning; =--se=, _v. refl._, to lean, =96=, 21.
=arrojar=, _v. a._, to throw, to throw down.
=arruinarse=, _v. refl._, to become bankrupt, to be ruined, =12=, 16.
=asegurar=, _v. a._, to secure, to make fast, to fasten, =65=, 13.
=asesinar=, _v. a._, to assassinate, to murder, to kill.
=así=, _adv._, thus, so; =--... como=, as well... as, both... and; =-- que=, when.
=asistir=, _v. n._, to be present, to attend.
=asomar=, _v. a._, to show, to thrust out, to project, =38=, 24; _pp._ =asomada=, =100=, 5, leaning from, appearing at; _v. refl._, =asomarse a=, =64=, 8, to lean over.
=asomo=, _m._, suspicion, conjecture; =ni por --=, =6=, 7, not in their wildest dreams; =90=, 17, don't dream of it.
=asunto=, _m._, matter, business; =-- reservado=, private matter, secret matter, =56=, 20; =vamos al --=, =51=, 6, we'll come to the point, let's get to business.
=asustarse=, _v. refl._, to be frightened, to be afraid, to take fright.
=atiborrado, da=, _adj._ (_pp._ of =atiborrar=, to stuff with wool), stuffed, =14=, 8.
=atrás=, _adv._, back, backwards, behind; =de -- hacia adelante=, backwards and forwards, =25=, 25.
=atravesar=, _v. a._, to break off, to interrupt, to shut off, =70=, 15; to cut across, =65=, 17; to cross, =69=, 20; =--se=, _v. refl._, to interpose, to come between, =108=, 17.
=atreverse=, _v. refl._, to dare, to venture, to be impertinent; =no se atrevía con su mujer=, he dared not face his wife, dared not stand up to his wife, =123=, 11. [p. 166]
=atropellar=, _v. a._, to override, to thrust aside, to force, =109=,
